name: Go Home, You Are Drunk
description:
You leave the pub and begin the walk home. Your head is spinning a little, but you think you'll be okay if you can make it to bed in time.

Go Home, You Are Drunk is a short choose-your-own-adventure game about trying to get home from the pub after a night out.

Play Go Home, You Are Drunk in your browser

I made this in April 2015 to teach myself how Twine worked. I think it was also the first game I ever made!
